1124723891123961856.text:
It’s 2019. Can we all now please stop saying “climate change” and instead call it what it is: climate breakdown, climate crisis, climate emergency, ecological breakdown, ecological crisis and ecological emergency?
#ClimateBreakdown #EcologicalBreakdown

1108739029628043264.text:
When my son was born, i created an email address for him.

Every achievement and photo taken is sent to that email.

When he is old enough, he will get the password and will have all those memories.

Sharing this idea for those who may like it to do as well.

1092426440988127234.text: in the app to the dev team + others discover and better understand and prioritize use (e.g. no one is using feature x or y and they should! - I swear I dont work for this company but @pendoio seems ideal for this-

1092426440212185088.text:
- have a way around the paywall for 1 or 2 or 5 per user per day? something like that to help drive virality of the positive kind

D. Align method for providing feedback (ideally in app itself but also could be app store? website? reddit? twitter?) essentially build in comms.

1092426439482359810.text:
C. + feature to share to contacts to add network effects to app (e.g. hey, brother, check out this meditation i loved this morning) 
* could be just with other users first

* Ideally empower us to share a discrete meditation out to a non-user so they can be best introduced

1092426438769344512.text:
3. Best ways to improve: 

--------------
A. + feature to save favorite daily meditations for later re-use
B. + feature to add own personal comments on these about why (e.g. this one is meaningful because of kindness)

1092426438022713344.text: B.) Delightful and simple UX and UI nice work metalab and team assuming it afterwards! C.) Ability to save and replay lessons on demand and see which are already played D...(goes without saying? great content from Sam)

1092426437313916928.text:
I'm a product manager, often think about apps and tech so please forgive the volume of feedback here. I am *very* happy to talk further about all or any of this, please! 
1. If I couldn't use it anymore I'd be: Very Disappointed 

2. Awesome at: A.) Stable and functional app
